text: The Women's 4 × 100 metre freestyle relay competition at the 2019 World Championships was held on 21 July 2019.ScheduleStart list ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Nation !! Time !!
